    • 方法详细资料

      • exchangeHeaders

        public boolean exchangeHeaders(AsyncHttpClientMiddleware.OnExchangeHeaderData data)
        从接口复制的说明: AsyncHttpClientMiddleware
        Called before when the headers are sent and received via the socket. Implementers return true to denote they will manage header exchange.
        指定者:
        exchangeHeaders 在接口中 AsyncHttpClientMiddleware
        覆盖:
        exchangeHeaders 在类中 SimpleMiddleware
        返回:

      • onRequestSent

        public void onRequestSent(AsyncHttpClientMiddleware.OnRequestSentData data)
        从接口复制的说明: AsyncHttpClientMiddleware
        Called once the headers and any optional request body has been sent
        指定者:
        onRequestSent 在接口中 AsyncHttpClientMiddleware
        覆盖:
        onRequestSent 在类中 SimpleMiddleware
